      Subclasses of AbstractController in com.mygdx.othello.controllers 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AIGameController
      This class manipulates the game logic while playing as well as all the touch input on the screen Only used when playing versus the AI
      class  GameController
      This class manages the game logic while playing as well as all the touch inputs on the screen
      class  MenuController
      This class manages touch inputs on the Menu Screen
      class  RulesController
      This class manages the touch input on the Rules Screen
      class  SettingsController
      This class manages the Settings logic, namely allows to save the preferences, and the touch inputs on the screen
